See artist smile look at tags.. cry.. cry a lot. But on a serious note this guys best work is the ghost one and that's legit the only thing I can think of that was good this ntr stuff is just disappointing and at this point even without reading I can tell if its ntr or not l.

This is ntr but not at the same time. They weren’t even dating and we didn’t even know how my man felt until the very end. But she was already taken by that time. But NTR doesn’t even faze anymore I just feel stupid reading with the bullshit plot every time
@xhawke09 they ain't lover tho the art is good but the story and character is stupid af, and woman this days love smol penis similar to the coach.
she did something that he probably wouldn’t have wanted her to do, she truly didn’t deserve him

Dude, mon-petit better not make this into a series, bc I got this head canon where homeboy’s dream comes true, and main girl stays as his friend, and they keep their relationship platonic, so no one gets hurt by her getting dicked down by ugly coach. I mean, she’s already damaged, but I’m salvaging. Preferably, she gets that negativity out of her life and finds a loving dude with a big dick no she got the bombshell body for it, but this is an NTR universe.

Dude, mon-petit got better at NTR. This shit is sad.
Like it’s unrealistic, and too many viewers try and project their views onto it (which tif is what NIR tries to bait) but if you drink the koolaid of a decent ntr and go with it... it’s pretty fucking sad. This one specifically is pretty sad. Reminds me a bit of ShindoL in the fact that the female character isn’t completely characterized by sex. Instead, she has a goal, and she sacrificed herself to the antagonist. The story structure is pretty interesting, considering the main point of NTR is a battle between men. Good shit, mon-petit. And also, I really want to be able to improve at my art at mom’s rate. From the Baseball one to this, seeing the arc in skill/technique is really inspiring as an artist.
ahahahahhaha i love ntr but man this its a hella RETARDED AND DUMB STORY
The girl let herself be talked into having sex. If she loved her boyfriend she could've just said no
Dumb bitch he'll probably find someone else and as the whore she'll became that coach's personal bitch. It's not like he love her or something.
